titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire to Francis Rawdon Hastings, Marquis of Hastings, Governor General in Council, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Governor General that as a result of the difficulties the Resident has faced raising the required funds for the British force at Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū], he has decided to maintain a sum of 50,000 rupees at Bushire in order to more quickly respond to their needs. The Governor General is further informed that a bill for this amount has been issued, and requests that he direct this bill to be paid by Government.
